[[File:Beren Vocal Score Cover.jpg|thumb|Vocal score cover by permission of Ted Nasmith]]
Published by Zarathustra Music in 2019, the complete Vocal Score of [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]'s ''[[Beren and Lúthien, Op. 47 (Opera)]]'' updated to reflect amendments made during the production of Volante Opera Production's Demo Recording of the work.

This is a 119 page A4 sized book with full gloss covers.

This is a complete piano reduction of the score with introduction by the composer, synopsis and translations of the Elvish.

Cover Illustration: TED NASMITH ©2019 “Lúthien"
